text: Holon with its pasture lands, Debir with its pasture lands,
Eleazar, called Avaran, saw one of the beasts covered with royal armor and bigger than any of the others, and so he thought the king was on it.
and whenever one of them is taken aside by some passerby who lies with her, she mocks her neighbor who has not been thought thus worthy, and has not had her cord broken.
And they picked up twelve wicker baskets full of fragments and what was left of the fish.
“A good tree does not bear rotten fruit, nor does a rotten tree bear good fruit.
Jesus answered and said to them, “Stop murmuring among yourselves.
